alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Weston County through 1145 PM MDT... At 1041 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Dull Center to 13 miles southwest of Morrisey. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morrisey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for Weston County.
